languages.text: Со смертью Риззы ее место занял тихий, склонный к нелепому словотворчеству человечек, предпочитающий звать себя Полезным знакомым. Мало кто догадывался, что этот тщедушный тип был старшим помощником Риззы, обладал железной волей и натурой истинного чудовища. Повинуясь его тихому голосу, пираты совершали дерзкие и жестокие рейды.

After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.
languages.original_text: Со смертью Риззы ее место занял тихий, склонный к нелепому словотворчеству человечек, предпочитающий звать себя Полезным знакомым. Мало кто догадывался, что этот тщедушный тип был старшим помощником Риззы, обладал железной волей и натурой истинного чудовища. Повинуясь его тихому голосу, пираты совершали дерзкие и жестокие рейды.

traits.locale_text: With the death of Ryzza, a quiet, prone to nonsensical word coinage man, who liked to refer to himself as a Helpful Acquaintance. Few could guess that this scrawny guy was Ryzza's chief officer and possessed an iron will and the characteristics of a true monster. Under the orders of his quiet voice, pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

Few could guess that this scrawny guy was Ryzza's chief officer and possessed an iron will and the characteristics of a true monster. Under the orders of his quiet voice, pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, possessing an iron will and truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, possessing an iron will and truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

languages.text: 莱萨死后，某个生性安静的男人取代了她的位置。他称自己只是个“好心的伙伴”，热衷于生造根本不存在的词语。几乎没人能猜得到，这个瘦骨嶙峋的家伙正是莱萨的大副，拥有钢铁般的意志和怪物般的本性。在他的暗中命令之下，海盗的暴力袭击变得愈发肆无忌惮。
languages.original_text: After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

traits.locale_text: 莱萨死后，某个生性安静的男人取代了她的位置。他称自己只是个“好心的伙伴”，热衷于生造根本不存在的词语。几乎没人能猜得到，这个瘦骨嶙峋的家伙正是莱萨的大副，拥有钢铁般的意志和怪物般的本性。在他的暗中命令之下，海盗的暴力袭击变得愈发肆无忌惮。

languages.text: Nach ihrem Tod wurde Ryzzas Platz von einem stillen Mann eingenommen, der sich nur als Nützliche Bekanntschaft bezeichnete und dazu neigte, sich unsinnige neue Wörter einfallen zu lassen. Nur wenige wussten, dass dieser dürre Bursche Ryzzas Erster Offizier gewesen war und einen eisernen Willen und einen wahrlich monströsen Charakter besaß. Auf seinen ruhigen Befehl hin führten die Piraten verwegene und brutale Überfälle aus.
languages.original_text: After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

traits.locale_text: Nach ihrem Tod wurde Ryzzas Platz von einem stillen Mann eingenommen, der sich nur als Hilfsbereite Bekanntschaft bezeichnete und dazu neigte, sich unsinnige neue Wörter einfallen zu lassen. Nur wenige wussten, dass dieser dürre Bursche Ryzzas Erster Offizier gewesen war und einen eisernen Willen und einen wahrlich monströsen Charakter besaß. Auf seinen ruhigen Befehl hin führten die Piraten verwegene und brutale Überfälle aus.

languages.text: Après sa mort, Ryzza fut remplacée par un homme discret et prompt à inventer un vocabulaire absurde, qui se faisait simplement appeler « Connaissance utile ». Rares furent ceux qui perçurent à l'époque la volonté de fer et la nature monstrueuse de ce frêle individu qui fut autrefois le second de Ryzza. Sous ses ordres, les pirates menèrent de nombreux raids aussi audacieux que violents.
languages.original_text: After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

traits.locale_text: Après sa mort, Ryzza fut remplacée par un homme discret et prompt à inventer un vocabulaire absurde, qui se faisait simplement appeler « l'ami serviable ». Rares furent ceux qui perçurent à l'époque la volonté de fer et la nature monstrueuse de ce frêle individu qui fut autrefois le second de Ryzza. Sous ses ordres, les pirates menèrent de nombreux raids aussi audacieux que violents.

languages.text: Tras la muerte de Ryzza, un hombre de pocas palabras ocupó su lugar. Se hacía llamar Conocido Útil y tenía la peculiar tendencia de crear sus propias palabras sin sentido. No mucha gente llegó a saber que este escuálido personaje era el antiguo contramaestre de Ryzza y que contaba con una voluntad de hierro y una naturaleza abominable. Bajo sus escuetas órdenes, los piratas llevaron a cabo asaltos atrevidos y violentos.
languages.original_text: After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

traits.locale_text: Tras la muerte de Ryzza, un hombre de pocas palabras ocupó su lugar. Se hacía llamar Conocido Útil y tenía la peculiar tendencia de crear sus propias palabras sin sentido. No mucha gente llegó a saber que este escuálido personaje era el antiguo contramaestre de Ryzza y que contaba con una voluntad de hierro y una naturaleza abominable. Bajo sus escuetas órdenes, los piratas llevaron a cabo asaltos atrevidos y violentos.

languages.text: リザがこの世を去ったあと、彼女の跡を継いだのは寡黙な男だった。彼は「便利な協力者」とだけ名乗り、意味をなさぬ造語を語る癖があった。このやせぎすがリザの最初の夫だと察した者はまずいなかったが、彼は鉄の意志と恐ろしい性根を持ち合わせていた。男が静かに指示を出せば、海賊たちは野放図に凶暴な襲撃を実行した。
languages.original_text: After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

traits.locale_text: リザがこの世を去ったあと、彼女の跡を継いだのは寡黙な男だった。彼は「便利な協力者」とだけ名乗り、意味をなさぬ造語を語る癖があった。このやせぎすがリザの最初の夫だと察した者はまずいなかったが、彼は鉄の意志と恐ろしい性根を持ち合わせていた。男が静かに指示を出せば、海賊たちは野放図に凶暴な襲撃を実行した。

languages.text: Ryzza'nın ölümünün ardından yerini, kendisine sadece Faydalı Tanıdık diyen ve kendi uydurduğu sözcükleri kullanma eğiliminde olan, sessiz bir adam aldı. Bu sıska adamın, Ryzza'nın demir gibi bir iradeye ve korkunç bir tabiata sahip ikinci kaptanı olduğunu pek tahmin edebilen olmadı. Korsanlar, onun sessiz emirleriyle arsız ve vahşi baskınlar gerçekleştirdi.
languages.original_text: After Ryzza's death, her place was taken by a quiet man who simply called himself a Useful Acquaintance and was prone to coining his own nonsensical words. Few guessed that this scrawny fellow had been Ryzza's first mate, who possessed an iron will and a truly monstrous nature. On his quiet orders, the pirates conducted brazen and violent raids.

traits.locale_text: Ryzza'nın ölümünün ardından yerini, kendisine sadece İşe Yarar Bir Tanıdık diyen ve kendi uydurma sözcüklerini kullanma eğiliminde olan, sessiz bir adam aldı. Bu sıska adamın Ryzza'nın demir gibi bir iradeye ve korkunç bir tabiata sahip yardımcı kaptanı olduğunu pek tahmin edebilen olmadı. Korsanlar onun sessiz emirleriyle arsız ve vahşi baskınlar gerçekleştirdiler.
